buildCommand: bash -lc 'pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && if grep -q "@meteora-invent/studio" package.json 2>/dev/null; then pnpm --filter @meteora-invent/studio build && pnpm --filter @meteora-invent/scaffold-fun-launch build && cp -r scaffolds/fun-launch/.next .next || true; else pnpm --filter @meteora-invent/scaffold-fun-launch build; fi'
